definitions.definition: a mixture of sugar with liquid or butter, typically flavored and colored, and used as a coating for cakes or cookies.
examples: glaze, frosting, topping, fondant, piping a cake with pink icing

definitions.definition: the formation of ice on an aircraft, ship, or other vehicle, or in an engine.
the action of shooting the puck from one's own end of the rink to the other but not into the goal, for which the referee calls a face-off in one's own end.

examples: frost, cover with icing, glaze she had iced the cake

definitions.definition: clinch (something such as a victory or deal).

examples: a man had been iced by the police

definitions.definition: shoot (the puck) so as to commit icing.
